raw_comment:
1. What do you notice?
I noticed that this graph is horizontal instead of it being vertical and that it has percentages on it.
2. What do you wonder?
Why are they showing Players of color and head coaches of color
3. How does this relate to you and your community? 
Because its talking about sports and some people from our community play sports. 
4. What’s going on in this graph? Create a catchy headline that captures the graph’s main idea. Its showing the percentages of players of color and the head coaches of color
ace_sentences: I notice that the graph is horizontal.
I notice that the graph has percentages.
I wonder why the graph shows players of color and head coaches of color.
This relates to me because the graph is about sports.
Some people in my community play sports.
The graph shows the percentages of players of color.
The graph shows the percentages of head coaches of color.
The headline is: The graph shows the percentages of players of color and head coaches of color.
